Webinar: Data Preparation Essentials for Automated Machine Learning, Nov 29

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Automated Machine Learning, Data Preparation, DataRobot, Jen Underwood

Jen Underwood will review how to organize data in a machine learning-friendly format that accurately reflects the business process and outcomes.


Data Preparation Essentials for
Automated Machine Learning
Practical steps toward mastering data 
preparation for predictive modeling
Webinar Details Register today
Wednesday, November 29, 2017      Guest Speaker: 
1:00 pm Eastern / 10:00 am Pacific      Jen Underwood
45 minutes with Q&A      Founder, Impact Analytix

In order to run successful machine learning projects and create highly-accurate predictive models for your business, you need effective data preparation. Although automated machine learning provides safeguards to prevent common mistakes, you'll still want to correctly prepare, shape and format your data to generate optimal models.

In this 45-minute session, Jen Underwood, Founder of Impact Analytix, will review how to organize data in a machine learning-friendly format that accurately reflects the business process and outcomes. We will share basic guidelines, practical tips and additional resources to help you start mastering the essence of predictive model data preparation. 
Discover the secrets to model-building success related to:
• Data collection, granularity, formats and structure
• Analytical feature engineering
• Dealing with data quality issues 

Guest Speaker:
Jen Underwood
Founder, Impact Analytix

Space is limited! Register today


DataRobot, Inc | One International Place Boston MA 02110
